data.question: What is the chemical formula for the unsubstituted aminodiboranate synthesized?
What method was used to synthesize Sodium N-Methylaminodiboranate?
data.answer: Reduction of dimethylamine−borane with Na in refluxing tetrahydrofuran.

data.question: What is the yield percentage for the synthesis of Sodium N-Ethylaminodiboranate using Method B?
What is the role of dioxane in the synthesis of aminodiboranate salts?
data.answer: Dioxane is added to the aminodiboranate salts, followed by extraction and crystallization from diethyl ether, to afford the corresponding dioxane adducts.

data.question: What is the significance of the Er(H3BNH2BH3)Cl2(thf)3 complex?
data.answer: It provides crystallographic verification of the H3BNH2BH3− motif.

data.question: How does the synthesis of Sodium N-Methylaminodiboranate differ from Sodium N-Ethylaminodiboranate?
data.answer: Sodium N-Methylaminodiboranate is synthesized by adding MeNH2 to BH3·thf, while Sodium N-Ethylaminodiboranate is synthesized by adding EtNH2 to BH3·thf.

data.question: Why is the synthesis of Sodium N,N-Methylethylaminodiboranate significant?
data.answer: It demonstrates the versatility of the synthesis method, allowing for the preparation of aminodiboranates with different N-alkyl groups.

data.question: What does the presence of NaBH4 as an impurity in some aminodiboranate syntheses indicate?
data.answer: It indicates that the reaction conditions might not be fully optimized, leading to the formation of by-products.

data.question: Is the synthesis of Sodium Aminodiboranate, Na(H3B-NH2-BH3)(thf)x, successful using both Method A and Method B?
Does the synthesis of Sodium N-Methylaminodiboranate result in a 100% pure product without any impurities?
Is the yield of Sodium N-Ethylaminodiboranate higher when synthesized using Method A compared to Method B?
Are the crystal structures of all synthesized aminodiboranate salts reported in the text?
Is the addition of dioxane necessary for the synthesis of all aminodiboranate salts?
Does the synthesis of Er(H3BNH2BH3)Cl2(thf)3 require the use of sodium metal?
